title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Sleepwalking
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A chronic sleepwalker who downplays her condition walks off a fifth-floor balcony while dreaming of the beach she never got to visit, her known medical condition meeting a hostel's inadequate safety measures.

death_teaser: She was already asleep when she took her last step.
